text: Solar kids are two brothers living in Mian Ghundi near Quetta, Pakistan who had a peculiar disease which paralyzed them at the time of sunset and they remained in this condition until sunrise. The story was aired by Dunya TV of Pakistan. Head of News Planning Dunya TV Irfan hashmi was approached by locals of Mian Ghundi about this unique phenomenon. Initially, he believed it a complete hoax but when he sent his team to the village an amazing story was discovered. Irfan Hashmi and his team gave them the name of solar kids. == References == Category:Pakistani people with disabilities Category:Pakistani children Category:People from Quetta District
